name: Wyn
text: Avatar of Magic — You may include [[cosmic entity ]]and [[spell ]]cards in your deck from aspects other than your chosen aspect. Action: Shuffle X [[cosmic entity ]]cards from your removed-from-game area into your deck → draw X cards.

name: Ser Reddwyn
text: Cosmic Commune — Interrupt: When a [[cosmic entity]] is drawn as a boost card, deal it to any player as an encounter card. (Limit once per phase.) “You’ve had the sugar, now here’s the salt.”

name: Aiko Maki
text: Response: After Aiko Maki enters play, shuffle a [[cosmic entity]] card from your hand or discard pile into the encounter deck. “Just know that I love you too.”

name: The-Powers-That-Be
text: Action: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck (without looking). When Revealed: Search your deck and discard pile for a resource, add it to your hand and remove this card from the game. This effect cannot be canceled.

name: The-Natural-Order
text: Action: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck (without looking). When Revealed: Search your deck and discard pile for an upgrade, add it to your hand and remove this card from the game. This effect cannot be canceled.

name: Cosmic Bargainer
text: Alter-Ego Action: Choose a player → that player searches their deck and discard pile for an [[artifact]] or a [[cosmic entity]] card and adds it to their hand. “I bet we can trade this in for something good.” -Ser Reddwyn

name: Cosmic Intervention
text: Hero Interrupt: When a card is revealed from the encounter deck, search the encounter deck for a [[cosmic entity]] card and reveal it → cancel all of the card’s effects and discard it.

name: Invoke a Favor
text: Hero Action: Search the encounter deck for a [[cosmic entity]] and reveal it → choose: • Deal 7 damage to an enemy. • Remove 5 threat from a scheme. “All I know is that you’ve made a mortal enemy.” -Wyn

name: Avatar of Magic
text: When paying for an [[artifact]], [[cosmic entity]] or [[spell]], generate this card’s printed resource from your discard pile by shuffling it into your deck.

name: Immortality
text: Response: After your deck resets, exhaust Immortality → heal 3 damage from your identity card. “No, I’m old. You’re just tired.” -Ser Reddwyn

name: Sharpened Soul
text: Ser Reddwyn gets +2 ATK. Forced Interrupt: At the start of your turn, place this card on top of your deck. “It’s about manifesting an object of power that’s a reflection of who you are.” -Ser Reddwyn

name: The Buchcub
text: Attach to an non-[[elite]] minion. Attached minion cannot activate. Treat its printed text box as if it were blank. “The longer you read it, the more it eats your mind.” -Ser Reddwyn

name: Wyn’s Bracelet
text: Action: Exhaust Wyn’s Bracelet → discard the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 [[cosmic entity ]]or [[spell ]]card discarded this way to your hand.

name: Dimitri Krakov
text: Interrupt: When you play a [[cosmic entity]], exhaust Dimitri Krakov → instead of shuffling it into the encounter deck, choose to either place it at the top or the bottom. “Calculating the odds that this is a good idea...”

name: Cosmic Audience
text: Player under any player’s control. Max 1 per player. Response: After you reveal a [[cosmic entity]] card, exhaust this card → draw 1 card.

name: Lady Death
text: Action: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck (without looking). When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to ALL characters. Remove this card from the game. This effect cannot be canceled.

name: Oblivion
text: Action: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck (without looking). When Revealed: Stun the villain and remove this card from the game. This effect cannot be canceled.

name: Preordained
text: Action: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck (without looking). When Revealed: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 card discarded this way to your hand. Remove this card from the game. This effect cannot be canceled.

name: The Contemplator
text: Action: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck (without looking). When Revealed: Give your identity a tough status card and remove this card from the game. This effect cannot be canceled.

name: The Possesor
text: Action: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck (without looking). When Revealed: Confuse the villain and remove this card from the game. This effect cannot be canceled.
